```r
library(mongolstats)
library(dplyr)
```

## List available tables

```r
itms <- nso_tables()
itms %>% select(tbl_id, tbl_eng_nm, strt_prd, end_prd) %>% slice_head(n = 10)
```

## Search tables by keyword

```r
nso_itms_search("population") %>% select(tbl_id, tbl_eng_nm) %>% slice_head(n = 10)
```

## Explore variables (codebook) for a table

```r
vars <- nso_variables("DT_NSO_2600_004V1")
vars %>% count(field)
vars %>% filter(field %in% c("CODE","CODE1","CODE2")) %>% slice_head(n = 10)
```
